general.gigTitle: develop professional responsive wordpress website optimized secure SEO friendly

sellerCard.oneLiner: WordPress Developer Keen to High Quality Service
sellerCard.description:
Hi, I am Khadija Rahman, and here to help you with your next Web development, web design project and SaaS (Software as a service).

For the last 7 years, working with about 50 clients from around 7 countries, gave me the eye for understanding clients' web development requirements. While serving these clients I grew a lot.

Let's talk about how I can help you with your next project.

description.content:
Hello, Welcome to my GIG

 

Before placing an order please contact me to discuss the project.

 

  • Are you looking for a simple site?
  • You are a business owner, Need a fully functional dynamic WordPress website for your business,
  • You currently have a WordPress website that you want to redesign for better performance. 

 

I am here to help.

With over 10 years in the IT industry, Ive served 300+ satisfied clients across diverse sectors.

 

With this gig you'll receive a WordPress website which will be:

  • A well functional professional responsive WordPress website.
  • Build for speed & SEO-friendliness.
  • Multi-stage security and firewall in place, so that it can handle hacks and assaults. 
  • An offline backup, cloud backup, and recovery strategy in place to minimize downtime.

 

I ensure that the design will be pixel perfect & all best practices will be implemented.


Thanks

slide.name: develop professional responsive wordpress website optimized secure SEO friendly
develop professional responsive wordpress website optimized secure SEO friendly

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
You need to provide domain and hosting login details for WordPress installation.
If WordPress is already installed, please share the login credentials along with the content you want uploaded to the site.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, we offer multiple revisions to ensure your complete satisfaction. Your satisfaction is our top priority.

questionsAndAnswers.question: I am unsure which package is right for me. Do you offer custom orders?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, if you're unsure which package suits your needs, or if you require a custom order, please message me, and I'll guide you in making the best decision.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you provide images if I don’t have any?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can source free stock images based on your needs.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can provide hosting, depending on your website's needs. Send me a message, and I'll suggest the best hosting options for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you develop the website on your server?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can build the website on my server and transfer it to yours at no additional cost upon completion.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What materials do you require before placing an order?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Website content and page details,
An email address for form configurations,
Logo or branding materials
Reference or competitor websites,
Information about the website’s purpose (e.g., business, fitness, health, coaching, etc.)

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer custom graphic and logo design services?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I do offer these services, though they come with a small additional fee.
